review_title: Descent hospital, but low pay for new grads
job_title: Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA
pros: New grad program that lasts around 2 weeks to help nurses feel more confident onto the floor
cons: Low pay for incoming new grad nurses

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Lakewood, CA
pros: The staff is awesome, but no enough #
cons: management sucks, and staffing is horrible always out of ration never gets lunch/breaks

job_title: Medical Assistant in Lakewood, CA
pros: Good starting pay and benefits
cons: Small hospital and not much parking

job_title: Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA
pros: Everyone worked together and the doctors were approachable, worked as a team with the nurses
cons: Hard to get admitted patients beds, long waits in the ER

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Lakewood, CA
pros: Very busy hospital with higher acuity patients and very friendly staff who are accomodating and helpful.
cons: Staffing issues with constant shortage and supply issues.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA
pros: Helpful, management are friendly, great place to start.
cons: Short staff, high acuity, little resources.

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Lakewood, CA
pros: The staff is really nice and helpful. We just got a new ER director and he's great. You see a large variety of patients.
cons: Not organized well. It's pretty chaotic. Always short on ED Techs. Psych patients will sit in the same bed for days waiting for placement.

job_title: New Grad RN in Lakewood, CA
pros: Great place to learn the necessary nursing skills as a new grad nurse. People are generally nice and willing to help.
cons: Pay is not as competitive as other surrounding hospitals.

job_title: ICU RN in Lakewood, CA
pros: Flexible schedule and good co worker
cons: Low pay and union is not working

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Los Angeles, CA
pros:
The community at Lakewood is small & close knit.
Scheduling is quite flexible if you work per diem.
cons: The staffing situation is terrible & always understaffed.

pros:
friendly staff
opportunity for new grad

management,
micromanager, disorganized no clear heirarchy,

job_title: ICU Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA

Nurses do no appreciate the work that you do

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Huntington Beach, CA

review_title: Great Place To Work But Corporate leadership is Cut throat
job_title: CDIS in Lakewood, CA
pros:
Lots of training and employment opportunities
Decent compensation
cons: Leadership has changed and pressures keep changing. Corporate leadership is more cutthroat than before and doesn't care about employees only the bottom line. They have been too quick to let go of experienced managers and directors causing dissary amongst lower staff

job_title: Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA
pros: Great family like environment. Supportive coworkers.
cons: Low pay. Some departments need an update.

job_title: Registered Respiratory Therapist in Lakewood, CA
pros: Lots of teamwork in the department.
cons: Unfortunately, they do have some Outdated equipment

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Long Beach, CA

job_title: Registered Respiratory Therapist in Lakewood, CA
pros: Co workers are the bomb.com

review_title: Small hospital with a big heart
job_title: Registered Nurse in Lakewood, CA
pros: Very seasoned nurses, very close group..like family. The staff really care and go the extra mile despite limited resources at times.
cons: None really . I just wish the hospital would expand.. We need room.. And parking.. Seems like we are always full to capacity and beyond

job_title: Phlebotomist in Norwalk, CA
pros: They have an amazing staff. This was my first position as a phlebotomist couldn't have asked for a better place.
cons: No cons to working here. I have nothing bad to say about this facility. This medical center was absolutely amazing.

job_title: Certified Surgical Technologist in Lakewood, CA
pros: Family type atmosphere. Nice people all around. Professional staff. Very busy for a small facility. Great location.
cons: Need more staff. The bottom line gets in the way of making the place really beautiful. Parking is awful. Security in the parking is even worse.

job_title: Operator in Lakewood, CA
pros: people are great, hours vary, in general a good, friendly place to be.
cons: Management  seems to be in a power struggle, pitting director against supervisor.  Staff is at the whim of both

review_title: Be ready to stick it out for the long haul
job_title: Medical Records Clerk in Lakewood, CA
pros: Free coffee and some of the best people in the field.
cons: Department is neglected by administration by lack of funding or not knowing even where our department is located in the hospital

job_title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist in Lakewood, CA
pros: Stable company , good learning experience
cons: Laboratory plagued by gossips which ruins the working environment.
